UniprotID	P30518
Accession	P30518;C5HF20;O43192;Q3MJD3;Q9UCV9
EntryName	V2R_HUMAN
ProteinName	Vasopressin V2 receptor (V2R) (AVPR V2) (Antidiuretic hormone receptor) (Renal-type arginine vasopressin receptor)
GeneName	AVPR2 ADHR DIR DIR3 V2R
Length	371
Function	Receptor for arginine vasopressin. The activity of this receptor is mediated by G proteins which activate adenylate cyclase. Involved in renal water reabsorption.
Subcellular Location	Cell membrane
